tool_description: Generate Dynamic  QR Code for text, website urls, email addresses, vcards, twitter profiles, facebook profiles, linkedin profiles, googleplus profiles, print or share qr codes  on advertisements  to generate trade leads from marketing campaigns.
name: Dynamic QR Code
title: Dynamic QR Code

api_list.name: Dynamic QR Code API
api_list.description:
Dynamic QR Code API- Developers Resource

Developers can integrate our QR Code API ( Application Programming Interface) into their web applications or mobile applications.
Generate Dynamic QR Codes for Targeted Marketing Compaigns and Lead Generations

API END POINT: https://www.omqrc.com/qrcodeapi

ParametersData TypeWhether MandatoryDescription
apikey string Yes Register and get API Key from member area
seckey string Yes Login to member area and set Secret Key
qrtext string Yes Information to be encoded in QR Code. Website URL in case you want to encode in QR Code
size Number between 150-1000 No Size of the UPI QR Code to be generated. If blank, then default size will be applied
front Hexa Color Code for foreground No If not supplied , then black and white UPI QR Code with be generated.
back Hexa Color Code for background No If not supplied , then black and white UPI QR Code with be generated.
logo Logo file URL No If Logo is not supplied, UPI QR Code till be generated without Logo. You should check whether QR Code is readable after displaying logo.

required_parameters.name: qrtext
required_parameters.description: You can send text or url in the parameter

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: QR Code outout parameter. In case you require Json data in response, then define json in parameter. If the parameter is not defined, then you will get image in the output.

optional_parameters.name: back
optional_parameters.description: Background Color of QR Code Image. 6 character hexa color code without #, i.e. 6C3483.  By default white background color will be used

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the QR Code to be generated. You can define 50-1000 in the parameter value. By default 500px QR Code will be generated

optional_parameters.name: front
optional_parameters.description: Foreground color of the QR Code to be used, 6 character hexa color code without #, i.e.  922B21 .  By default black color be used
